entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning this morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
